title: I Could Never Be So Lucky Again
description: The complete autobiography of an American hero, Jimmy Doolittle.Pilot, scholar, daredevil, general . . . James "Jimmy" Doolittle was one of America's greatest heroes. In a life filled with adventure and achievement, Doolittle did it all. Now, for the first time, here is his life story—modest, revealing, and candid as only Doolittle himself can tell it. Doolittle tells a story of the successes and adventures, the triumphs and tragedies of a true American hero—a far-seeing leader whose courage, devotion, and daring changed the course of modern history . . . and continues to make its influence felt to this day.
author: James H. Doolittle
